title: Blood Red Tide
description: The Rangers have returned from the prehistoric past to find themselves in an even more dangerous time---the present.Being on the run takes money. On the run from the richest man in the world takes millions.From a forgotten cave in the Nevada desert to the pirate-infested seas of the ancient world, the Rangers hunt for treasure lost to time. The travelers to the past find once again that history is not what it seems and the future is always in doubt. Blood Red Tide was previously published as part of One Helluva Bad Time
author: Chuck Dixon
